summary: Implements a Home Assistant sensor platform that retrieves realâ€‘time traffic information from the French Sytadin service, parses the data, and exposes it as sensor entities with attributes such as congestion level, average speed and jam status, while throttling updates to respect rate limits.
business_intent: Enable Home Assistant users to monitor and react to French highway traffic conditions, supporting automation, alerts and dashboards based on live congestion and speed data.
